rows.GAME PHYSICS RULEBOOK: The actual rules of how decisions and work operate in this trade

rows.col_2: All decisions captured in permanent records. No verbal-only decisions.
Operator decides day-to-day. CM validates. Studio approves strategy.
Fixed sprint budget. No scope creep without approval.
Daily metrics. Weekly review. Monthly strategy.
Miss 2 milestones = intervention. Miss 3 = pause trade.
